void set_normalized_descriptors ( c_lst_pockets *  pockets  ) 

## FUNCTION: set_normalized_descriptors

## SPECIFICATION: Perform normalisation for some descriptors, so that the maximum value of a given descriptor become 1 and the minimum value 0. This way, each descriptor is normalized and take into account relative differences between pockets. To do so, we use the simple formula: Dnorm = (D - Dmin) / (Dmax - Dmin) with Dmin (resp. dmax) being the minimum (resp. maximum) value of the descriptor D observed in all detected pockets.

WARNING: It is assumed that basic descriptors have been normalized before calling this function!

## PARAMETRES: @ c_lst_pockets *pockets : The list of pockets

## RETURN: void: s_desc is filled

Definition at line 585 of file pocket.c.

float set_pocket_mtvolume ( s_pocket *  pocket,
int  niter 
)

## FUNCTION: set_pocket_mtvolume

## SPECIFICATION: Get an monte carlo approximation of the volume occupied by the pocket given in argument.

## PARAMETRES: @ s_pocket *pocket: Pockets to print @ int niter : Number of monte carlo iteration

## RETURN: float: volume.

Definition at line 275 of file pocket.c.

References c_lst_vertices::first, node_vertice::next, s_pocket::pdesc, rand_uniform(), s_vvertice::ray, s_pocket::v_lst, node_vertice::vertice, s_desc::volume, s_vvertice::x, s_vvertice::y, and s_vvertice::z.

00276 {
00277         int i = 0,
00278                 nb_in = 0,
00279                 nit = 0 ;
00280 
00281         float xmin = 0.0, xmax = 0.0,
00282                   ymin = 0.0, ymax = 0.0,
00283                   zmin = 0.0, zmax = 0.0,
00284                   xtmp = 0.0, ytmp = 0.0, ztmp = 0.0,
00285                   xr = 0.0, yr = 0.0, zr = 0.0,
00286                   vbox = 0.0 ;
00287 
00288         c_lst_vertices *vertices = pocket->v_lst ;
00289         node_vertice *cur = vertices->first ;
00290         s_vvertice *vcur = NULL ;
00291 
00292         /* First, search extrems coordinates */
00293         while(cur) {
00294                 vcur = cur->vertice ;
00295                 
00296                 /* Update min: */
00297                 if(nit == 0) {
00298                         xmin = vcur->x - vcur->ray ; xmax = vcur->x + vcur->ray ;
00299                         ymin = vcur->y - vcur->ray ; ymax = vcur->y + vcur->ray ;
00300                         zmin = vcur->z - vcur->ray ; zmax = vcur->z + vcur->ray ;
00301                 }
00302                 else {
00303                         if(xmin > (xtmp = vcur->x - vcur->ray)) xmin = xtmp ;
00304                         else if(xmax < (xtmp = vcur->x + vcur->ray)) xmax = xtmp ;
00305         
00306                         if(ymin > (ytmp = vcur->y - vcur->ray)) ymin = ytmp ;
00307                         else if(ymax < (ytmp = vcur->y + vcur->ray)) ymax = ytmp ;
00308         
00309                         if(zmin > (ztmp = vcur->z - vcur->ray)) zmin = ztmp ;
00310                         else if(zmax < (ztmp = vcur->z + vcur->ray)) zmax = ztmp ;
00311                 }
00312 
00313                 cur = cur->next ;
00314                 nit++ ;
00315         }
00316 
00317         /* Next calculate the box volume */
00318         vbox = (xmax - xmin)*(ymax - ymin)*(zmax - zmin) ;
00319         
00320         /* Then apply monte carlo approximation of the volume.   */
00321         for(i = 0 ; i < niter ; i++) {
00322                 xr = rand_uniform(xmin, xmax) ;
00323                 yr = rand_uniform(ymin, ymax) ;
00324                 zr = rand_uniform(zmin, zmax) ;
00325                 cur = vertices->first ;
00326                 
00327                 while(cur) {
00328                         vcur = cur->vertice ;
00329                 /* Distance between the center of curent vertice and the random point */
00330                         xtmp = vcur->x - xr ;
00331                         ytmp = vcur->y - yr ;
00332                         ztmp = vcur->z - zr ;
00333 
00334                 /* Compare r^2 and dist(center, random_point)^2  to avoid a call to sqrt() function */
00335                         if((vcur->ray*vcur->ray) > (xtmp*xtmp + ytmp*ytmp + ztmp*ztmp)) {
00336                         /* The point is inside one of the vertice!! */
00337                                 nb_in ++ ; break ;
00338                         }
00339                         cur = cur->next ;
00340                 }
00341         }
00342 
00343         pocket->pdesc->volume = ((float)nb_in)/((float)niter)*vbox ;
00344 
00345         /* Ok lets just return the volume Vpok = Nb_in/Niter*Vbox */
00346         return pocket->pdesc->volume ;
00347 }

00169                                 if(dist(vert->x, vert->y, vert->z, fvert->x, fvert->y, fvert->z) <= params->clust_max_dist){
00170                                         groupCreatedFlag=1;
00171                                         /* Add a new pocket */
00172                                         if(resid == -1 && fvert->resid==-1){                                            
00173                                                 resid=++curPocket;
00174                                                 vert->resid=resid;
00175                                                 fvert->resid=curPocket; 
00176                                                 /* Create a new pocket */
00177                                                 s_pocket *pocket = alloc_pocket();                              
00178                                                 pocket->v_lst=c_lst_vertices_alloc();
00179                                                 /* Add vertices to the pocket */
00180                                                 c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->v_lst, vert);                           
00181                                                 c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->v_lst, fvert);
00182 
00183                                                 if(vert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) cur_n_apol++;
00184                                                 else cur_n_pol++;
00185 
00186                                                 if(fvert->type==M_APOLAR_AS)cur_n_apol++;
00187                                                 else cur_n_pol++;
00188 
00189                                                 c_lst_pockets_add_last(pockets, pocket,cur_n_apol,cur_n_pol);
00190                                         }
00191                                         /* Add new vertice to existing pocket */
00192                                         else if(resid!=-1 && fvert->resid==-1)                                          
00193                                         {
00194                                                 fvert->resid=resid;
00195                                                 node_pocket *pocket=searchPocket(resid,pockets);
00196                                                 if(pocket) c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->pocket->v_lst, fvert);
00197 
00198                                                 if(fvert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) pocket->pocket->nAlphaApol+=1;
00199                                                 else pocket->pocket->nAlphaPol+=1;
00200                                         }
00201                                         else if(resid==-1 && fvert->resid!=-1) {
00202                                                 vert->resid = fvert->resid;
00203                                                 resid=fvert->resid;
00204                                                 node_pocket *pocket = searchPocket(resid,pockets);
00205                                                 if(pocket) c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->pocket->v_lst, vert);
00206                                                 if(vert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) pocket->pocket->nAlphaApol+=1;
00207                                                 else pocket->pocket->nAlphaPol+=1;
00208                                         }
00209                                         else if((resid!=-1 && fvert->resid!=-1) && (resid!=fvert->resid)) {
00210                                                 node_pocket *pocket=searchPocket(resid,pockets);
00211                                                 node_pocket *pocket2=searchPocket(fvert->resid,pockets);
00212                                                 /* Write content of pocket1 into pocket2 */
00213                                                 mergePockets(pocket,pocket2,pockets);                                   
00214 
00215                                                 for(z=0;z<lvvert->nvert;z++){
00216                                                         /* Merge two clusters -> to optimize */
00217                                                         if(vertices[z].resid==resid) vertices[z].resid=fvert->resid;    
00218                                                 }
00219                                                 resid=fvert->resid;
00220 
00221                                         }
00222                                 }
00223                         }
00224                         else {
00225                                 if(filteredIdx >= lvvert->nvert) {
00226                                         fprintf(stdout, "INDEX ERROR\n") ;
00227                                 }
00228                         }
00229                 }
00230         }
00231         /* if a pocket was created return the pocket */
00232         if(groupCreatedFlag) return curPocket;
00233         
00234         /* if no vertice neighbours were found, still build a new pocket containing 
00235          * only one vertice */
00236         
00237         cur_n_apol=0;
00238         cur_n_pol=0;
00239         resid=++curPocket;
00240         vert->resid=resid;
00241         s_pocket *pocket=alloc_pocket();                                /* Create a new pocket */
00242         pocket->v_lst=c_lst_vertices_alloc();
00243         c_lst_vertices_add_last(pocket->v_lst, vert);   /* Add vertices to the pocket */
00244         if(vert->type==M_APOLAR_AS) cur_n_apol++;
00245         else cur_n_pol++;
00246 
00247         c_lst_pockets_add_last(pockets,pocket,cur_n_apol,cur_n_pol);
00248 
00249         return curPocket;
00250         
00251 }

Generated on Sun Jul 5 22:10:40 2009 for fpocket by  1.5.9
